actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to authorize State and local governments to use social security account numbers for jury selection purposes.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Social Security Act to declare it to be U.S. policy that States or subdivisions of States may utilize social security numbers for identifying: (1) duplicate listings of individuals in master lists used for jury selection purposes; and (2) master list listings of individuals ineligible for jury service because they were convicted of a felony.

titles.title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to authorize State and local governments to use social security account numbers for jury selection purposes.
